T02D2460:134b-1: sa m'a dhi sambha ra ba ri brta /
T02D2460:134b-4: 'jig rten mgon po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2460:134b-5: dang po'i snying rje'i stobs las byung //
T02D2460:134b-6: rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems brtan bya //
T02D2460:134b-7: srid pa'i longs spyod bde ma chags //
T02D2460:134b-8: yongs su 'dzin pa rgyab kyis phyogs //
T02D2460:134b-9: dad sogs nor ni phun sum tshogs //
T02D2460:134b-10: bla ma sangs rgyas dang mnyam gus //
T02D2460:134b-11: des bstan dam tshig spyod pa ni //
T02D2460:134b-12: yongs su bskyang la rab tu brtson //
T02D2460:134b-13: bum pa gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba //
T02D2460:134b-14: bla ma'i drin gyis yongs su thob //
T02D2460:135a-2: sgrub pa po de dngos grub snod //
T02D2460:135a-3: ting 'dzin yan lag las byung ba'i //
T02D2460:135a-4: tshogs ni yongs su rdzogs pa # //
T02D2460:135a-6: sa m'a dhi sambha ra ba ri brta /
T02D2460:135a-8: ting 'dzin yan lag nyams gyur cing //
T02D2460:135a-9: de yi mi mthun phyogs gnas na //
T02D2460:135a-10: skye ba bye ba stong gis kyang //
T02D2460:135a-12: ting nge 'dzin ni rab grub phyir //
T02D2460:135a-13: gsang sngags spyod gnas rnal 'byor bas //
T02D2460:135a-14: de las gzhan pa'i sems spangs te //
T02D2460:135a-15: g-yeng med brtson pas 'bad par bya //
T02D2460:135a-16: ting nge 'dzin gyi yan lag dang //
T02D2460:135a-17: mi mthun phyogs gang nges bya'i phyir //
T02D2460:135a-18: ting 'dzin yan lag mi mthun phyogs //
T02D2460:135a-19: de ni mdor bsdus nas bshad bya //
T02D2460:135a-20: tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa dang //
T02D2460:135a-21: longs spyod rnams la ltos med nyid //
T02D2460:135a-22: bzod ldan dam bca' brtan pa dang //
T02D2460:135a-24: lus dang ngag yid las rnams la //
T02D2460:135a-25: shes bzhin dang ni ldan pa dang //
T02D2460:135a-26: sangs rgyas skur 'dogs dran pa yi //
T02D2460:135a-27: lus kyi rjes dran yang dag ldan //
T02D2460:135a-28: dus gang du ni bya ba yi //
T02D2460:135a-29: rjes dran de la brtan pa dang //
T02D2460:135a-30: sgrib pa lnga ni spang ba dang //
T02D2460:135a-31: zas kyi tshod rig spyod lam ran//
T02D2460:135a-32: 'jig rten chos ni thams cad la //
T02D2460:135a-33: rtag tu sems ni btang snyoms dang //
T02D2460:135a-34: yo byad bsnyungs 'di yan lag ste //
T02D2460:135a-35: go bzlog pa ni mi mthun phyogs //
T02D2460:135a-36: ting 'dzin tshogs kyi le'u bkod pa'i bsod nams des //
T02D2460:135a-37: 'gro bas ting 'dzin rdo rje lta bu thob par
T02D2460:135a-38: shog / ting nge 'dzin gyi tshogs kyi le'u slob
T02D2460:135a-39: dpon mkhas pa chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye
T02D2460:135a-40: shes kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so //
T02D2460:135a-41: rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dang /
